General.Name: Kestrel Gold Inc
General.Description: Kestrel Gold Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for gold deposits. The company holds 100% interest in the King Solomon Dome project located in Yukon Territory. It also has an option agreement to acquire 100% interest in the Grabben and Sixtymile properties located in the Tintina Gold Belt; and the QCM property located in northern British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Bling Capital Corp. and changed its name to Kestrel Gold Inc. in June 2010. Kestrel Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 110 12th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2R 0G7
